text: Lasse Granqvist, born 25 October 1957 in Solna, Sweden is a Swedish sports journalist. He was active for Sveriges Radio from August 1987 to 15 January 2013.LarsTommy.se: Om Lasse , accessdate: 3 December 2013 On 1 January 2000 became active for C More Entertainment. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish journalists
title: Lasse Granqvist
